MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog affecting properties in Gellilydan and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:41AM.  In order to complete urgent repairs to damaged overhead lines, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:02PM on 29th March 2021
